Description: Excellent Job Opportunity for Head of International Business – GCC RegionShark partners with the world's leading brands to design & manufacture consumer environments. Shark is an industry leader with unmatched knowledge, infrastructure & quality standards.Shark brings value to brands and retailers. Shark offers extensive solutions of shopfitting manufacturing, prototyping, value engineering, localization, material research and technology to our clients. We create creative retail solutions and products for consumer and retail environments. Shark is one of the leaders in furniture and shop-fittings solutions for the retail industry and corporate offices. Head of International Business – GCC regionWhat you will be doing.We are seeking a highly motivated, tenacious and experienced Head of International Business to lead our expansion efforts in GULF region. You will be responsible for maintaining the existing client relationships and creating strategies to grow the organic business with them. As a primary responsibility, you will devise strategies and connect with new prospective customers and expand sharks business.With high levels of passion and energy, you will thrive on shaping the company middle east strategy establishing our brands to fulfil the growing appetite for retail shop-fittings across GCC. To be successful in your application, you will be driven to exceed targets, adopting an innovative and resourceful approach to all areas of the role. Finally, you will be a confident communicator, negotiator, and decision-maker.Key responsibility areas· Developing and implementing an international business plan. Negotiating and approving contracts with clients.
